timeline.message: Refactor, consolidate unncessary method overrides into abstract class and inline.

Consolidate abstract methods, fix data clump code smell.

The two abstract classes EndTurnPanel and MoveForumPosterPanel override
4 boolean returning methods and each returns the same value for each
method override. These 4 methods can be replaced with a single method.

timeline.bodyText: This is a consolidation of the 4 parameters to one, each child class was uniform in returning a true or false, so we only need one value here.
